Text: I don't remember Grandpa, \n but Zaza told me Sachya \n was his imaginary friend.
I can't put my \n finger on it, but \n you look sad.
Raven, what's \n wrong?
Thanks for picking \n our flowers up.
It's your fault, \n you run too fast!
Zaza and Sachya... \n Those are nice names.
He's the one who \n gave me the name \n Sachya!
Zaza! \n Wait up!
Sachya! \n You dropped \n Grandpa's flowers!
Yes, I suppose I was.
Zaza was named \n after Grandpa.
I was just saying...
Stop bothering the \n poor woman and \n come on!
Raven?
Yeah... \n Yeah, I think I am.
Sad?
You're acting strange. \n Are you okay?
Zaza, I'll keep you and the others safe...

You better make 
 good use of 
 that power, 
 it's all we had.
We can barely maintain \n our forms.
And we still need what \n little we have left \n for another time.
Of course.
It's working!
But we're \n not out of \n this yet.
This won't go unnoticed. \n They're coming.
They're not letting \n the Ark go without \n a fight...
Protect the Ark
More of them...
Again!?
I have to protect the Ark!
Leave the Ark alone!
I can't let anything happen to the Ark!
The Ark's almost gone!
ZAZAAA!
Ark Strength
The Ark is \n almost ready.
The world is repairing \n itself, but it needs \n more time.
I won't let anything \n happen to the Ark!
They just keep coming!
I have to stop them!
I can't let them destroy the Ark.
They don't give up, do they?
Huh?
What's that sound?
Why won't it \n go down!?
Raven, you can't \n do this alone.
But I'm the \n only one here! \n If I don't-
You must lead \n that monster \n elsewhere.

Your other half. 
 The other Shifter. 
 You need to 
 come together.
But she's frozen \n in time like \n all the others!

Hmph, gone. 
 Never expect a 
 straight answer 
 from a Creator.
They don't know \n when to stop!
I'm afraid they know \n what we're up to.
They're moving to purge \n Kat from the world.
What!?
You have to stop them.
Hurry, this could be \n our last chance to put \n the world back.

I took out the 
 small fry, but 
 what about that 
 monster!?
How am I supposed to \n take it down?
Meow!
You!?
Yes, the other \n Shifter's guardian \n can help.
Together, you \n can be whole.
Zaza...
Raven, there is \n one last thing \n you must do.
Now the Ark will \n return to where \n it belongs...
There is something \n left before the \n world can heal.
What?
This world is \n surprisingly \n delicate.
It's like a complicated \n puzzle constructed \n from glass.

I've searched 
 the solution space, 
 but there is only one 
 answer.
Two things that must \n vanish from time \n itself to fix the world.
One is the bus that \n fell to the bottom \n of the world.

If the children on 
 that bus never fell, 
 they never would've 
 needed the Ark.

You mean stop 
 the accident? 
 Save Zaza and the 
 others from falling?
Yes. That is a very \n important piece \n of the puzzle.
But you are also an \n essential piece of \n the puzzle.
And that leads me to \n the other thing that \n must vanish.
Sachya.

You were never 
 meant to be born 
 into this world 
 as Sachya.
And as long as Sachya \n exists, the accident \n cannot be undone.

Raven... 
 Once Sachya is gone, 
 your past will go 
 with her.
I'm sorry, \n this is the only way.

If Sachya never 
 existed... If I forget 
 Zaza... Everything 
 will be set right?

I... 
 I don't want a world 
 where Zaza and the 
 others have to suffer.

Are you ready to rewrite 
 the past and put things 
 back to the way they 
 were meant to be?
The world has been overwritten.
When you wake again, \n you won't remember anything.
Not even Zaza...
They've... Come together?
Grab the \n Giant Collector's Attention
Leave the Ark alone!
I can't let anything happen to the Ark!
The Ark's almost gone!
ZAZAAA!
I can't just let that thing destroy the Ark!
Leave them alone!
The Ark can't take this.
I have to get that thing away from the Ark.
I won't let the Ark get destroyed!
Get away from the Ark!
It's me you want!
Draw the Giant Collector \n to Kat
I have to get that thing over to Kat!
Dusty!
Defeat the Giant Collector
He's weak, now's our chance, Dusty!
It's going back for the Ark!
Grab the \n Giant Collector's Attention
Leave the Ark alone!
Stay away from the Ark!
The Ark's almost gone!
ZAZAAA!
I can't just let that thing destroy the Ark!
That got its attention!
It's healing itself!
What would you sacrifice to \n save the children in the Ark?
Everything...
That's right! Over here!
Come and get me!
Pick on me instead!
Wait! I'm the one you want!
No! Leave the Ark alone!
I have to grab its attention again!
Bit: \n Attack all you want, you can't defeat it alone.
Bit: \n You have to draw it to the other Shifter.
Bit: \n You must work together with the other Shifter.
I've almost lured it back to Kat.
Bit: \n That giant Collector is returning to the Ark!
There, I brought that monster to the station where Kat is.
Hurry and Defeat \n the Collectors
They're after Kat! I need to take them out.
Bit: \n You need to handle the smaller ones first.
No...
Time until Purging
Bit: \n It's too late...
I'm the only one who can save the children.
I won't let anything happen to you, Zaza.
Catch the Bus
I have to save the children!
Almost... There...
Zaza, me... We're all on that bus.
Zaza did everything he could to protect me.
Now it's my turn to save Zaza.
I can't leave the fight!
